zh-cn: 玛纳瓦图梅西大学学院

description.zh-cn: 位于新西兰北帕默斯顿的公立大学，在惠灵顿和奥克兰设有分校区。其名称来自于纪念新西兰前总理威廉·弗格森·梅西。
description.en: A public university in Palmerston North, New Zealand, with campuses in Wellington and Auckland. It is named in memory of former New Zealand Prime Minister William Ferguson Massey.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰前总理，梅西大学因其在土地改革中的贡献而以其名字命名。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of New Zealand, after whom Massey University was named for his contributions to land reform.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰历史上的一所联邦制大学，于1961年解散。
description.en: A historical federal university in New Zealand, dissolved in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 位于新西兰惠灵顿的公立大学。
description.en: A public university located in Wellington, New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 位于新西兰奥克兰的公立大学。
description.en: A public university located in Auckland, New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 一所教育学院，于1996年与梅西大学合并。
description.en: A college of education that merged with Massey University in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 由梅西大学和惠灵顿维多利亚大学合办的音乐学校。
description.en: A music school jointly run by Massey University and Victoria University of Wellington.

description.zh-cn: 梅西大学的校长。
description.en: Chancellor of Massey University.

description.zh-cn: 梅西大学的副校长。
description.en: Vice-Chancellor of Massey University.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰政治人物，梅西大学校友，曾任新西兰副总理。
description.en: New Zealand politician, Massey University alumnus, and former Deputy Prime Minister of New Zealand.

en: Deputy Prime Minister of New Zealand

description.zh-cn: 新西兰政府的副总理职位。
description.en: The position of Deputy Prime Minister in the government of New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰政治人物，梅西大学校友，曾任新西兰内政部部长。
description.en: New Zealand politician, Massey University alumnus, and former Minister of Internal Affairs of New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰政府部门，负责公民、社区和政府事务。
description.en: A government department of New Zealand responsible for citizenship, community, and governmental affairs.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰政治人物，梅西大学校友，曾任新西兰社会发展就业部部长。
description.en: New Zealand politician, Massey University alumna, and former Minister for Social Development and Employment of New Zealand.

nodes.id: 新西兰社会发展就业部

zh-cn: 新西兰社会发展就业部

description.zh-cn: 新西兰政府的公共服务部门，负责社会援助。
description.en: The public service department of New Zealand charged with social assistance.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰商人、政治人物，梅西大学校友，曾任奥克兰市市长，Hubbard Foods创始人。
description.en: New Zealand businessman and politician, Massey University alumnus, former Mayor of Auckland City, and founder of Hubbard Foods.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰奥克兰市的市长职位。
description.en: The position of mayor for Auckland City, New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 由迪克·哈伯德创立的食品公司。
description.en: A food company founded by Dick Hubbard.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰商界人士，梅西大学校友，曾任新西兰电信总裁。
description.en: New Zealand business leader, Massey University alumnus, and former CEO of Telecom New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰的一家电信公司。
description.en: A telecommunications company in New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚企业家，梅西大学校友，贝尔集团创始人。
description.en: Australian entrepreneur, Massey University alumnus, and founder of Bell Resources.

description.zh-cn: 由Robert Holmes à Court创立的公司。
description.en: A company founded by Robert Holmes à Court.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰学者，梅西大学校友，曾任梅西大学常务副校长及奥克兰大学副校长。
description.en: New Zealand academic, Massey University alumnus, former Deputy Vice-Chancellor of Massey University and Vice-Chancellor of the University of Auckland.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰教育家，梅西大学校友，曾任梅西大学副校长。
description.en: New Zealand educator, Massey University alumnus, and former Vice-Chancellor of Massey University.

nodes.id: 梅西大学学生社团联合会(MUSAF)

zh-cn: 梅西大学学生社团联合会(MUSAF)

description.zh-cn: 代表梅西大学学生的团体联合会。
description.en: A federation of associations representing students at Massey University.

description.zh-cn: 梅西大学的学生会组织。
description.en: The students' association of Massey University.

nodes.id: 梅西大学中国学生联合会（MUACSA）

zh-cn: 梅西大学中国学生联合会（MUACSA）
en: Massey University Albany Chinese Students' Association

description.zh-cn: 梅西大学的中国学生联合会。
description.en: The Chinese students' association at Massey University.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰皮划艇运动员，梅西大学校友，奥运冠军。
description.en: New Zealand canoeist, Massey University alumna, and Olympic champion.

description.zh-cn: 新西兰赛艇运动员、自行车运动员，梅西大学校友，奥运冠军。
description.en: New Zealand rower and cyclist, Massey University alumnus, and Olympic champion.

description.zh-cn: 其农业学院与惠灵顿维多利亚大学的农业学院合并组建了新西兰农业学院（梅西大学前身）。
description.en: Its agricultural school merged with that of Victoria University of Wellington to form the New Zealand Agricultural College (a predecessor of Massey University).

description.zh-cn: 1926年，其农业学院与奥克兰大学的农业学院合并组建了新西兰农业学院（梅西大学前身）。1963年，其北帕默斯顿校区与梅西学院合并成立了玛纳瓦图梅西大学学院，为梅西大学成为独立大学奠定了基础。
description.en: In 1926, its agricultural school merged with that of the University of Auckland to form the New Zealand Agricultural College (a predecessor of Massey University). In 1963, its Palmerston North campus merged with Massey College to form the Massey University College of Manawatu, paving the way for Massey to become an independent university.

description.zh-cn: 前身新西兰农业学院作为新西兰大学的第六所学院成立。
description.en: Its predecessor, the New Zealand Agricultural College, was established as the sixth college of the University of New Zealand.

description.zh-cn: 在纽西兰大学解散后，梅西学院成为了惠灵顿维多利亚大学的一部分。
description.en: After the dissolution of the University of New Zealand, Massey College became part of the Victoria University of Wellington.

description.zh-cn: 与梅西大学教育学院合并。
description.en: Merged with Massey University's College of Education.

description.zh-cn: 与惠灵顿维多利亚大学合办新西兰音乐学校。
description.en: Jointly established the New Zealand School of Music with Victoria University of Wellington.

description.zh-cn: 与梅西大学合办新西兰音乐学校。
description.en: Jointly established the New Zealand School of Music with Massey University.

relationships.target: 新西兰社会发展就业部
梅西大学学生社团联合会(MUSAF)

description.zh-cn: 是梅西大学学生社团联合会的组成成员之一。
description.en: Is a constituent member of the Massey University Students' Associations Federation.

relationships.target: 梅西大学学生社团联合会(MUSAF)

description.zh-cn: 是梅西大学学生社团联合会的组成成员之一。
description.en: Is a constituent member of the Massey University Students' Associations Federation.
